attributes.action: Allow everyone on the electoral register to vote on a second EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
For more information please see this link:

http://www.aboutmyvote.co.uk/register-to-vote/who-can-register-to-vote
attributes.background:
Currently, you qualify to register to vote if you are:
-a British citizen
-an EU citizen resident in the UK
-a qualifying Commonwealth citizen resident in the UK
On the first EU referendum, EU citizen's living lawfully in the UK were not allowed to vote in spite of their contribution to the UK.
